name: Rocket Golf [Elastic]
description:
Click and Drag to launch either end of the elastic.

Hold RMB for Slow-Mo.

This game started as a submission for GMTKJam 2021 but I didn't have a lot of time that weekend and didn't want to crunch so I worked on it on and off  over the last days. If you're having trouble getting results, try to use the slow-mo function :)

Still to add are shot count, level selection and some polishing. Making more levels would also not be too hard.

Thanks for checking out the game :)
